alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:48AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Johnson County through 615 AM MDT... At 548 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Mayoworth, which is also 21 miles south of Buffalo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Johnson County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 269 and 287. Interstate 90 between mile markers 67 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
